page.title: 01LANDSCAPE-DARENTH VALLEY
page.content: Our area is rural,with farmland full of cereals and other crops.The villages we live in are in the Darenth Valley,close enough to the motorway to attract com- muters. Many people travel by rail to London to work each day. Not many of our parents work in the villages,so we are glad of the motorways and railways to take them to work in towns. When the War ended in 1945, more people came to live in our villages so modern houses were built for them;the older houses are clustered around the village church. Although we are near a motorway,it is cleverly planned so the villagers do not notice it. Some of the older houses have walls built of flint,some have white weather boarding. We also have timber framed houses in our villages.
